sys_atf_step.notes: Verify that the users, groups and silos have been set up properly

sys_update_version.name: sys_atf_step_6866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb70
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from display_value="">7f403e8a1b5050d0a89720a8ec4bcbdb</copied_from><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes>Verify that the users, groups and silos have been set up properly</notes><order>8</order><snapshot/><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-15 14:24:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>6866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb70</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DataSilos" source="x_snc_datasilos">dafbffebdbb78450ba15a353059619eb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DataSilos">dafbffebdbb78450ba15a353059619eb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_6866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb70</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-15 14:48:23</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="">086671a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcbea</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=6866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb70"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>6866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb70</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-15 14:24:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>2866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb71</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-15 14:24:49</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {

	
	
	var RenderValue = x_snc_devtools.RenderValue;
	var Debug = x_snc_devtools.Debug;
	var GetGroupsFromUser = x_snc_devtools.GetGroupsFromUser;

	Debug('Verify the creation of users during the InitializeRecords test');
	
	stepUserA_MEMBER = steps('1066b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb3f');
	stepUserA_FULFILLER = steps('dc66b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb4f');
	stepUserA_SUPERVISOR = steps('2866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb60');

	
	var strUserA_MEMBER = stepUserA_MEMBER.user.toString();
	var strUserA_FULFILLER = stepUserA_FULFILLER.user.toString();
	var strUserA_SUPERVISOR = stepUserA_SUPERVISOR.user.toString();

	
	Debug('User A-MEMBER: '+strUserA_MEMBER);
	Debug('User A-FULFILLER: '+strUserA_FULFILLER);
	Debug('User A-SUPERVISOR: '+strUserA_SUPERVISOR);
	

	var aUserA_MEMBERGroups = GetGroupsFromUser(strUserA_MEMBER);
	var aUserA_FULFILLERGroups = GetGroupsFromUser(strUserA_FULFILLER);
	var aUserA_SUPERVISORGroups = GetGroupsFromUser(strUserA_SUPERVISOR);
	
	Debug('Groups A-MEMBER: '+RenderValue(aUserA_MEMBERGroups));
	Debug('Groups A-FULFILLER: '+RenderValue(aUserA_FULFILLERGroups));
	Debug('Groups A-SUPERVISOR: '+RenderValue(aUserA_SUPERVISORGroups));
	
	if (aUserA_MEMBERGroups.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: A-MEMBER has no groups!');
		return false;
	}
	if (aUserA_FULFILLERGroups.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: A-FULFILLER has no groups!');

		return false;
	}
	
	var aUserA_MEMBERSilos = GetSilosFromUser(strUserA_MEMBER);
	var aUserA_FULFILLERSilos = GetSilosFromUser(strUserA_FULFILLER);

	Debug('Silos A-MEMBER: '+RenderValue(aUserA_MEMBERSilos));
	Debug('Silos A-FULFILLER: '+RenderValue(aUserA_FULFILLERSilos));
	
	if (aUserA_MEMBERSilos.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: User A-MEMBER has no silos!');
		return false;
	}
	if (aUserA_FULFILLERSilos.length == 0)
	{
		Debug('Error: User A-FULFILLER has no silos!');
		return false;
	}

	
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
</value><variable display_value="">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>6866b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb70</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-15 14:24:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>6466b1a11bfc5810a89720a8ec4bcb71</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-15 14:24:49</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
